snippet.title: Just Dance 2015 Launch Trailer [NORTH AMERICA]
snippet.description:
Just Dance 2015 is out now!

www.JustDanceGame.com 
#JustDance2015 

Available on all motion-control platforms. 
Features over 40 of today's hottest tracks: 
"Birthday" by Katy Perry
"Black Widow" by Iggy Azalea Ft. Rita Ora
"Bang Bang" by Jessie J, Ariana Grande and Nicki Minaj 
"Diamonds" by Rihanna
"Maps" by Maroon 5
"She Looks So Perfect" by 5 Seconds of Summer
"Bad Romance" by Lady Gaga
"Addicted To You" by Avicii
"Best Song Ever" by One Direction 
and many more! 

Visit our Website! http://www.JustDanceGame.com 
Join us on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/JustDanceGame
Follow us on Twitter! http://www.twitter.com/JustDanceGame
Follow us on Instagram! http://instagram.com/justdancegame
Add us on Snapchat! Username: JustDance

© 2014 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Just Dance, Ubi.com, Ubisoft, and the Ubisoft logo are trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries. "PlayStation", the "PS" Family logo and "PS3" are registered trademarks and the PlayStation Network logo is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. Nintendo trademarks and copyrights are properties of Nintendo.
